{"id":874379079,"question_id":69,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1673222514,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"99 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/874379079/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sqrt(x)","memory":"43.9 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number} x\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar mySqrt = function(x) {\n  if (x === 1 || x === 0) return x; // special case\n\n  let half = x;\n  let halfSqr = half * half;\n  let prev;\n  while (halfSqr > x) { // keeps half x untill halfsqr less than x and keeps track of prev half\n    prev = half;\n    half = Math.floor(half / 2); \n    halfSqr = half * half;\n  }\n\n  half = Math.floor((prev + half) / 2); // middle of the sqr numbers less than 'half' and 'prevHalf'\n  halfSqr = half * half; // updates halfsqr\n\n  while (half > 0) {\n    if (halfSqr === x || (halfSqr < x && ((half + 1) * (half + 1) > x))) { // checks if 'x' is between range\n      return half;\n    }\n    // subtracts or adds 1 to half depending on if halfsqr is larger or smaller than 'x'\n    if (halfSqr > x) {\n      half--;\n      halfSqr = half * half;\n    } else if (halfSqr < x) {\n      half++;\n      halfSqr = half * half;\n    }\n  }\n  \n  return x;\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sqrtx","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
